quality_assessment: Page is well-organized with comprehensive coverage and modern MkDocs Material features. All internal links are valid and the quick reference table accurately reflects the example content in linked pages.
positive_aspects: Clear and concise introduction explaining the chapter's purpose
Excellent quick reference table mapping use cases to specific examples
Uses MkDocs Material grid cards for visual category organization
Proper use of Material icons for visual appeal (:material-rocket-launch:, :material-source-branch:, etc.)
All 5 internal links to example category pages are valid
Example numbering (1-13) is consistent with the content in the linked pages
Verification timestamp shows documentation is actively maintained
Progressive organization from basic to advanced examples
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding a brief 'Getting Started' recommendation pointing to Example 1 for newcomers
Could add a 'Prerequisites' section noting any required setup (Claude Code CLI, etc.)
May benefit from a small 'What You'll Learn' callout box highlighting key takeaways

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features

visual_features_present: Material Design icons with size modifiers (.lg .middle)
Octicons arrow icons for navigation links
visual_features_missing: No admonitions (info/tip/warning boxes) - could add a 'Getting Started' tip
No mermaid diagrams - acceptable for an index/overview page
No code annotations - acceptable for an index page without code
